title: Chelsea Showcase Potter Magic
description:
The FC crew recap Chelsea-s 3-0 win over AC Milan as Graham Potter's side cast their magic in the Champions League once again. Plus, the panel discuss whether Xavi is right in being angered over two controversial handball decisions during their 1-0 loss to Inter, and the unlikely source who leaked Lionel Messi's reported return to Barcelona.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Chelsea run away from AC Milan in 3-0 win; Xavi's anger over handball decisions; Messi's rumored Barcelona return
